igny.command.enderchest.no_permission: You don't have permission to drop ender chest items
igny.command.enderchest.real_player_op_o: Only operators can drop ender chest items of real players
igny.command.fixnotepitch.success: Successfully changed %s note blocks to pitch %s
carpet.rule.playerMiningFatigueFreeGuard: Player Immune to Guardian Mining Fatigue
carpet.rule.wetSpongeCanAbsorbLava.desc: Wet Sponges can absorb lava (turn into dry sponges)
Permission to drop ender chest items
Usage: /player <name> drop all - drops inventory + ender chest (if permitted)
Usage: /player <name> drop inventory - drops only inventory items
Usage: /player <name> drop enderchest - drops only ender chest items
Without permission: 'all' drops only inventory items
With permission: 'all' drops both inventory and ender chest items
Real players: Only OPs can drop their ender chest items
Fake players: Follows the permission setting above
carpet.rule.noWardenDarkness.desc: Warden attacks no longer apply darkness effect to players.
carpet.rule.floatingIceWater.desc: Ice melts into water anywhere, even when floating in air.
carpet.rule.noZombifiedPiglinNetherPorta: When the Nether portal in the Overworld receives a random tick, zombified piglin will not naturally spawn in the Nether portal in the Overworld
carpet.rule.projectileDuplicationReintro: Reintroducing the projectile residual tick replication behavior from Minecraft versions below 1.21.2
carpet.rule.skeletonsPickupSwordsReintro: Reintroducing the skeleton pickup swords behavior from Minecraft versions below 1.21.4
carpet.rule.minecartMotionFix.desc: Ports the feature from versions 1.21-1.21.1 where minecars carrying passengers transfer their momentum to passengers during the teleport tick when crossing dimensions to version 1.21.2 and above
carpet.rule.tntMinecartEmptyDamageSource: Fixed the source of empty damage in TNT minecarts
carpet.rule.fakePlayerBoatYawFix.desc: Fake players will not correct yaw when riding boats.
When removing a fake player, remove the vehicle they are riding in.
cantrade: Remove the vehicle when there are no villagers or wandering merchants on it, and other entities remain the default
carpet.rule.candlePlaceOnIncompleteBlock: Candle can place on incomplete block
carpet.rule.commandFixnotepitch.desc: Adjust the pitch of the note blocks within the range to zero
carpet.rule.commandFixnotepitech.extra.0: Whether or not to generate block updated is controlled by the FixnotepitchUpdateBlock rule
carpet.rule.fixnotepitchUpdateBlock.desc: Control whether the CommandFixnotepitech rule generates block updated
carpet.rule.happyGhastNoClip.desc: Happy Ghast has players who ride while ignoring block collisions
carpet.rule.onlyPlayerCreateNetherPortal: Only players can create nether portal
carpet.rule.noWitherEffect.desc: Wither, Wither Skeleton, and Wither Rose cannot grant players the Wither effect
carpet.rule.setDefaultArgument.desc: In `/carpet <rule> <value> <setDefault>`, the command permission for the `<setDefault>` argument is controlled, allowing the rule to be directly set as the default
carpet.rule.zombifiedPiglinDropLootIfAng: When enabled, zombified piglins that die within 100 game ticks of becoming angry or targeting a player will drop loot and xp orbs as if killed by a player
It reverts the behavior back to mc < 25w02a (1.21.5 snapshot) and unfixes MC-56653
carpet.rule.locatorBarNoFakePlayer.desc: The locator bar does not show fake players
carpet.rule.fakePlayerLoginLogoutNoChatI: Fake players do not send login/logout messages to the chat
carpet.rule.commandPlayerOperate.desc: Use the /playerOperate command to manage player actions
carpet.rule.commandClearLightQueue.desc: Clears the light queue of the world
